unittitle_ssm: Dwight B. Demeritt, Jr. photographs of the Cadman Plaza excavation site
abstract_ssm: The collection, dating from 1965, shows views of the excavation site of a parcel of land in Brooklyn Heights that had been razed for the construction of Cadman Plaza.
